{"id":506309469,"lang":"cpp","time":"2 weeks, 5 days","timestamp":1623400985,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/506309469/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reformat The String","memory":"7.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string reformat(string s) {\n        string ans;\n        string aa;\n        string bb;\n        for (auto x: s) if (isalpha(x))\n                aa.push_back(x);\n            else\n                bb.push_back(x);\n        int diff = aa.size() - bb.size();\n        if (abs(diff) > 1) return \"\";\n        int i = 0, j = 0, mx = max(aa.size(), bb.size());\n        if (bb.size() > aa.size()) swap(aa, bb);\n        for (int k = 0; k < mx; ++k) {\n            if (i < aa.size()) ans += aa[i++];\n            if (j < bb.size()) ans += bb[j++];\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reformat-the-string"}
